product_name: The North Face Sabrina Rucksack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The 30-liter Sabrina Rucksack from The North Face keeps up with your active lifestyle, offering a place for everything you'll need throughout your day. Main compartment features a dedicated 17 in. laptop compartment with a zippered side entry so you can access your computer or tablet without unpacking the bag. Hidden pocket in the lower back panel stashes your wallet for safekeeping while keeping it accessible. Multiple exterior pockets maximize functionality with a zippered compartment on the top flap and two lower flap pockets. Daisy chain on the front of the pack holds a U-lock (sold separately) during your bike commute. Durable waterproof material at the base will protect your laptop and other possessions from getting wet when you set the pack on the ground. The North Face Sabrina Rucksack is made from a polyester twill fabric that has a waterproof coating and water-resistant zippers throughout to help keep your gear dry. Closeout.
short_description: The 30-liter Sabrina Rucksack from The North Face keeps up with your active lifestyle, offering a place for everything you'll need throughout your day.
